Description: Model or miniature cast shovel in copper alloy; missing handle; very corroded.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by World Museum, Liverpool. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.

This model (?) tool does not come from the foundation deposit of Ptolemy II. This shape is not recorded in Petrie's inventory of the deposits (see various model tools illustrated in: Petrie 1886, pl. XXV).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (TD.29)
